title: Gernot und Strudel
description: Gernot is a worm and flawless leader. Kommandant Strudel Goofel-berry is a sassy hippo. Join them and their friends, Uschi and Booshi and Doctor Du-Du Dankers, in their magical world of an old German coat hanger factory.
altHero: Strudel the hippo and Uschi and Booshi, a two-headed blob
